auth.signOutDescription: All your data will be removed from this device. If there are pending changes, they will be lost. If you login again, all the data will be re-synced.
auth.verificationCodeSent: We sent a verification code to your email.
auth.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset. You can now login with your new password.
auth.loggedOutAllDevices: You have been logged out of all devices.

passwordRequirements.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
passwordRequirements.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
passwordRequirements.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
passwordRequirements.special: Password must contain at least one special character

account.deleteAccountDescription: Account delete will be available soon.

workspace.deleteWorkspaceDescription: Once you delete a workspace, there is no going back. Please be certain.
workspace.deleteWorkspaceConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this workspace?
workspace.deleteWorkspaceWarning: This action cannot be undone. This workspace will no longer be accessible by you or others you've shared it with.
workspace.descriptionPlaceholder: Write a short description about the workspace

channel.createChannelDescription: Create a new channel to collaborate with your peers
channel.updateChannelDescription: Update the channel name and icon
channel.deleteChannelConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this channel?
channel.deleteChannelDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the channel and all its data.
channel.channelNotFoundDescription: The channel you are looking for does not exist. It may have been deleted or your access has been removed.

chat.chatNotFoundDescription: The chat you are looking for does not exist. It may have been deleted or your access has been removed.

space.createSpaceDescription: Create a new space to organize your projects
space.deleteSpaceConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this space?
space.deleteSpaceDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the space and all its data.
space.descriptionPlaceholder: Write a short description about the space

database.createDatabaseDescription: Create a new database to organize your records
database.updateDatabaseDescription: Update the database name and icon
database.deleteDatabaseConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this database?
database.deleteDatabaseDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the database and all its data.

file.dropFilesHere: Drop files here to upload them in the folder
file.deleteFileConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
file.deleteFileDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the file.

server.deleteServer: Are you sure you want to delete the server
server.deleteServerDescription: Deleting the server will remove all accounts connected to it. You can re-add it later.
server.serverDeleted: Server and all associated accounts have been deleted

errors.mobileNotSupportedTitle: Hey there! Thanks for checking out Colanode.
errors.mobileNotSupportedDescription: Right now, Colanode is not quite ready for mobile devices just yet. For the best experience, please hop onto a desktop or laptop. We're working hard to bring you an awesome mobile experience soon.
errors.mobileNotSupportedFooter: Thanks for your patience and support!
errors.browserNotSupportedDescription: Unfortunately, your browser does not support the Origin Private File System (OPFS) feature that Colanode requires to function properly.
errors.browserNotSupportedHttps: If you're self-hosting Colanode make sure you are accessing the web version through a secure 'https' way, because some browsers require HTTPS to use the features required.
errors.insteadOrTryAnother: instead or try another browser. If you think this is a mistake or you have any questions, please open an issue on

view.createViewDescription: Create a new view to display your database records
view.deleteViewConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this view?
view.deleteViewDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the view.

field.deleteFieldConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this field?
field.deleteFieldDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the field and all its data.
field.deleteOptionConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this option?
field.deleteOptionDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the option.

page.createPageDescription: Create a new page to organize your content
page.updatePageDescription: Update the page name and icon
page.deletePageConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this page?
page.deletePageDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the page and all its content.
page.updatePageNameAndIcon: Update the page name and icon

folder.createFolderDescription: Create a new folder to organize your files
folder.updateFolderDescription: Update the folder name and icon
folder.deleteFolderConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this folder?
folder.deleteFolderDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the folder and all its content.
folder.updateFolderNameAndIcon: Update the folder name and icon

storage.loadingStorageData: Loading storage data from the server...

record.deleteRecordConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this record?
record.deleteRecordDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the record.

message.deleteMessageConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
message.deleteMessageDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the message.

misc.addCustomServer: Add a custom server to login to
misc.maxFileSize: The maximum size per file is {size}MB.
